title: Daniel: PE版0.16 beta版 或已向beta测试玩家开放

@MissMarzenia
The beta build will currently show as 0.15.9 but it is 0.16.0!
Beta Build 版本显示的是0.15.9，但其实是0.16.0

@darngee
The MCPE 0.16 android beta is now available (I hope) for players in the beta program, let us know what you think!
MCPE 0.16 安卓 Beta 版本发布了（应该），请提出任何建议！
